# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/styled.py
@source-hash: 799367cc6ac8e248
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:00:04Z

## Core Purpose
Style wrapper component for Rich library renderables. Applies styling transformations to any renderable object while preserving its measurement characteristics.

## Key Components

### Styled Class (L11-34)
Primary wrapper class implementing the Rich protocol for styled renderables.

**Constructor (L19-21)**
- `renderable`: Any Rich-compatible renderable object
- `style`: Style specification to apply across the entire renderable

**Rich Console Protocol (L23-29)**
- `__rich_console__()`: Core rendering method that applies style transformation
- Resolves style using console's style system (L26)
- Renders wrapped renderable and applies style to all segments (L27-28)
- Returns styled segment iterator

**Rich Measurement Protocol (L31-34)**
- `__rich_measure__()`: Delegates measurement to wrapped renderable
- Preserves original dimensions without style overhead

## Dependencies
- `.measure.Measurement`: Dimensional measurement utilities
- `.segment.Segment`: Text segment manipulation with `apply_style()` method
- `.style.StyleType`: Style type definitions
- TYPE_CHECKING imports: Console rendering infrastructure

## Architecture Pattern
Decorator/Wrapper pattern - wraps any renderable to add styling behavior while implementing Rich's rendering protocols. The wrapper is transparent to measurement but transforms visual output.

## Usage Context
Part of Rich's styling system for applying consistent styles to complex renderables. Commonly used internally by Rich components and available for user styling of custom renderables.
